title: Celery stuffing
ingredients: ['115g butter', '80g finely chopped onion', '240g diced celery, with leaves', '700ml chicken stock, or as needed', '725g bread cubes', '3 eggs, beaten', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon ground sage', '1 pinch dried thyme', '1 pinch dried marjoram']
